oddity.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a strange or unusual person or thing
oddity.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: In a class of 120 students there were four women including myself, and I still felt rather an oddity.
oddity.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a strange quality in someone or something
oddity.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: 60s fashions that are remembered for their oddity
